simplechat
Class EchoServer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ocsf.server.AbstractServer
        |
        +--simplechat.EchoServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class EchoServer
extends AbstractServer

This class overrides some of the methods in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the server.

Author:
Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge
, Dr Robert Laganière , François Bélanger , Paul Holden
